title: Signature Type Foundry – New Prague based type design studio
tags: new prague based type design studio
content:
Hi everybody! Signature Type Foundry is happy to announce the release of several new typefaces: Aktion, Clara Sans  
Clara Serif, Corridor, Fenomen Sans, Galaxy, Haven, Meridianus Sans, Meridianus Serif, Quodlibet Sans and Quodlibet Serif. We would be very pleased if you checked out our website: [signaturetype.cz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082859/http:/www.signaturetype.cz/).  
All attached pictures are from our exhibition at 26th International Biennial of Graphic Design Brno 2014.

Thanks!  
Tomas Nedoma
